import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-footer-section', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule], template: `

Footer

We build beautiful websites

Footer

We build beautiful websites

Be Social

  • Agreements

© 2022 Bauhaus Research

All Rights Reserved

`, styles: [ ] }) export class FooterSectionComponent { constructor(private router: Router) {} @Input() routeLink?: string; navigateToNewComponent(routeLink: string) { if (routeLink) { this.router.navigate([routeLink]); } else { throw new Error('Invalid route link provided.'); } } urlLauncher() { // Implement your URL launching logic here } }
